body:
Just curious, what is the length of your school/college typical day? For me, on Mondays its from 8:50 - 4:10 and Tuesday to Fridays its from 8:50 - 3:10

How about you?
body_tagged:
Just curious, what is the length of your school/college typical day? For me, on Mondays its from 8:50 - 4:10 and Tuesday to Fridays its from 8:50 - 3:10

How about you?
title: How long does your school/college day last?

replies.body: Monday is 8am - 6pm. Tuesday I got off. Wednesday is 10am - 12pm then 2pm - 4pm. Thursday is 3pm to 5pm. Friday is 8am - 12pm. When I'm not at college I'm studying so XD
replies.body_tagged: Monday is 8am - 6pm. Tuesday I got off. Wednesday is 10am - 12pm then 2pm - 4pm. Thursday is 3pm to 5pm. Friday is 8am - 12pm. When I'm not at college I'm studying so XD

replies.body:
Do work shifts count?

Either 7am-3:40pm
or
3pm-Midnight
replies.body_tagged:
Do work shifts count?

replies.body:
I leave my house at 6.15, reach school at 7
Assembly starts at 7.40, Lessons start at 8.10
Lessons end at 2.15 everyday but Tuesday, which ends at 1.30
Every alternate week I have Chinese remedial on Monday, till around 3.30
Every week I have CCA on Friday, till around 7
replies.body_tagged:

Lessons end at 2.15 everyday but Tuesday, which ends at 1.30
Every alternate week I have Chinese remedial on Monday, till around 3.30
Every week I have CCA on Friday, till around 7

replies.body:
Monday - 8:30 am - 3:20 pm.
Tuesday - 9:35 am - 1:10 pm.
Wednesday - 8:30 am - 1:10 pm.
Thursday - 8:30 am - 3:20 pm.
Friday - 8:30 am - 2:15 pm.

This isn't including after-school activities/clubs, sports and other activities, in which case I don't normally get home before 5:00 pm on some days.

replies.body:
Monday: 9-11:39 then my personal health & wellness 5:30-8:00pm
Tuesday, Thursday, & Friday: 10:18-11:39
Wednesday: 9-11:39
I have enough credits to graduate high school already, but I am a Junior, and I'm also a freshman in college. When I graduate high school I'm going to earn my diploma and Associate's degree with a few certificates.
